results.name: Smallest base in which n is a repdigit.
comment: Numbers n such that a(n) < n - 1 correspond to Brazilian numbers (A125134); conversely, positive numbers n such that a(n) >= n - 1 correspond to A220570. - _Rémy Sigrist_, Apr 04 2018
link: Rémy Sigrist, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
program: (PARI) a(n) = for (b=2, oo, if (#Set(digits(n, b))<=1, return (b))) \\ _Rémy Sigrist_, Apr 04 2018
